rooms.description: A spacious lobby with a small reception area for initial greetings and to store outerwear.
An open-plan living space that flows into the central courtyard. The layout ensures natural light and ventilation from the south-eastern part of the house as per Vastu guidelines.
Adjacent to the living area, promoting communal eating space with a view towards the courtyard. Aligned eastward for auspicious energy.
A functional kitchen designed with modern utilities and storage facilities. Placed in the southeast corner to align with Vastu principles for prosperity.
A small utility bathroom located near the kitchen area for efficiency and privacy.
A dedicated gym space with equipment storage. Positioned on the north side of the ground floor to promote a balance between exercise and relaxation while minimizing noise disturbances.
A guest room that doubles as office or study space, placed in a quiet corner with good ventilation and indirect sunlight.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance aligned with the north-east corner to invite positive energy. The door is designed for ease of access and security.
An opening leading into the central courtyard that enhances natural light and provides a cooling breeze as per Vastu recommendations.
A small opening that leads to an external balcony providing scenic views and a direct connection with nature. Aligned with the Vastu principle of enhancing positive energy from the southeast.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light. The bed is positioned in the southwest corner to support rest and positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated bathroom attached to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.
A storage area integrated into the first floor layout to maximize space and maintain organization.
A quiet study or library space with a view towards the central courtyard. Aligned in the eastern part of the house to enhance creativity as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: A balcony that overlooks the courtyard and provides privacy. Designed to maintain a connection with nature while ensuring sufficient airflow.
A discreet staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor. It is positioned to minimize traffic congestion in the living areas.
A secondary exit for emergency evacuation, ensuring safety and compliance with local building norms.
